name: @meetup/swarm-icons
description: Icon Components for Meetup's Swarm Design System
author: hsbacot <hsbacot@gmail.com>

scripts.generate: npm i -g now@16.2.0 && npx svgo src/icons/**/*.svg && yarn clean:components && src/build.js --f=solid && src/build.js --f=line && src/build.js --f=large
scripts.build: yarn generate && npx babel src --out-dir lib --ignore 'src/**/*.test.js','src/build.js'
